title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1950.1 - Retainer statements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1950.1 - Retainer statements

State Regulations

Attorneys shall include a copy of a
retainer agreement with the initial filing of any court papers. Said agreement
should state, inter alia, when and by whom the attorney was retained, the terms
of the retainer and a brief statement as to the services to be
performed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1950.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
